aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.line1: I specialize in Front-end and Back-end Web development, as well as Mobile development.
aboutMe.line2: In these fields, I can intervene on all types of missions: from simple maintenance to the complete creation of your web and/or mobile application, right through to their deployment.
aboutMe.line3: Thanks to my professional experience, my many personal projects and my training at Epitech, I'm now autonomous and productive enough to meet all your development needs.
aboutMe.line4: I'm used to working on small projects as well as more complex ones, implementing small functionalities as well as larger ones.
aboutMe.line5: To bring your project to life, I'll work with you to find the best technical and ergonomic solutions.
aboutMe.line6: Looking forward to working with you, please don't hesitate to contact me!
